Author: mole99
Content:
I think you're hitting this issue: https://github.com/The-OpenROAD-Project/OpenROAD/issues/8868
Unfortunately, I don't want to risk updating OpenROAD so close to the tapeout. However, there is a workaround that I used for the project template. You can set the PDN halo around the macros slightly smaller than the halo size for cutting the rows.

Author: mole99
Content: Thanks a lot, Clyde. I'll take a look at the PR!
